We're excited to announce the release of NIMBLE version 1.2.0, which includes several new features and significant improvements.

## New Features

### Enhanced Sequential Monte Carlo
- Improved particle filter algorithms
- Better support for state-space models
- New bootstrap and auxiliary particle filters

### MCMC Improvements
- More efficient adaptive samplers
- Better convergence diagnostics
- Enhanced mixing for challenging posteriors

### nimbleFunction Enhancements
- Support for additional mathematical operations
- Improved debugging capabilities
- Better integration with R environments

## Performance Improvements

- Faster model compilation times
- Reduced memory usage in large models
- Optimized linear algebra operations

## New Distributions

Added support for several new probability distributions:
- Multivariate t-distribution
- Generalized Pareto distribution
- Additional parameterizations for existing distributions

## Installation

```r
install.packages("nimble")
```

## Breaking Changes

Please note the following changes that may affect existing code:
- Deprecated functions have been removed (see migration guide)
- Some default sampler choices have been updated

## Documentation

- Updated User Manual with new examples
- Enhanced function documentation
- New vignettes for advanced topics

## Acknowledgments

Special thanks to the community members who contributed bug reports, feature requests, and testing feedback.

For complete details, see the NEWS file in the package.
